plot: When a medical emergency leaves schoolteacher Amanda fighting for her life, her desperate husband Mike signs her up for Rivermind, a high-tech system that will keep her alive.

The lives of happily married couple Mike and Amanda are turned upside down when Amanda lapses into a coma with a brain tumour. In desperation Mike signs Amanda up to a new procedure that will essentially connect Amanda's brain to the vendor's server. Mike and Amanda aren't aware of what they're letting themselves in for.—grantss
